snippet.title: ARMS OF GOD - Game Teaser [Dark Roguelite Autoshooter]
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam:  
⚔️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/3100310/Arms_of_God/ ⚔️

ARMS OF GOD is a dark, futuristic medieval autoshooter with a satisfying, gory Doom vibe, where you wield 5 weapons at once and plunge into the depths of hell to halt the apocalypse.

As the last warrior of an ancient order, unlock active abilities, develop your skill tree, and mix and match weapons with upgrades as you rebuild your sacred order and fight hordes of demons.


FEATURES of Arms of God include:
- Hand-sculpted, hand-painted, and animated 3D characters (no AI)
- Fully immersive 3D environments powered by Unreal Engine 5
- A one-of-a-kind fantasy narrative, revealing new, mysterious layers of the story as players progress
- An expansive metaprogression system intertwined with story progression and achievements
- Surprising build crafting options—mix and match weapons with upgrades to discover new synergies
- A deeply satisfying gore system
- Each hero comes with an active ability and a unique skill tree
- Auto-firing from up to 5 weapons simultaneously, with optional manual aiming

Early Access release is planned for Q2 2025.
